name: parasite thing
description:
shitily made puzzle game i made cause i felt like putting effort into something while i was tired

mobile may be a bit harder

also dont resize the page it fucks up the text

you are worm or slug or parasite i dont fucking know but the thing like green checkmarks so go there but he hate red x's and if he hits one he fucking dies

Click to jump

go to the check

red dudes make you move in a square clockwise

yellow dudes make you smaller but faster

the smaller dude make you teleport to the other small dude when you hit the arrows but can only be hit while purple

some objects are below the screen it was made that way

im probably forgetting something
